text: Pierre Bourguignon (1630–1698) was a French Baroque painter. Bourguignon was born in Namur. He worked in Paris during the years 1671-1685 but moved north after the Edict of Nantes to the Hague where he became a member of the Confrerie Pictura in 1687.Pierre Bourguignon in the RKD Bourguignon died in London. ==References== * Category:1630 births Category:1698 deaths Category:People from Namur (city) Category:French Baroque painters
title: Pierre Bourguignon (painter)
